rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0001
rows.name: Well? Here we are. Not too shabby, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0001_2
rows.name: For a giant beached spaceship, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0002
rows.name: But...like it or not, this place is our home now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0003
rows.name:
We took the name from the city
it was modeled after back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0004
rows.name: We call it New Los Angeles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0006_m
rows.name:
And so it was that another survivor
came to join our band of refugees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0006_f
rows.name:
And so it was that another survivor
came to join our band of refugees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Together, we resolved to forge a new way of life
here on Mira, come what may.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0008
rows.name: New LA was our beautiful lie to ourselves...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0008_2
rows.name: Truth is, we were adrift, heading into the unknown.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0009
rows.name: Our native home was gone, swallowed in a shroud of light...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0010
rows.name:
And our future was uncertainâ€”
we had no idea what fate lay in store for us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0011
rows.name: Only that we had to keep living in order to see it.[ST:wait ]
